level.text: The following uses are prohibited in Waterfront Districts:
Any establishment that has as a principal use the administration of massages;
Any industrial use prohibited in the M District;
Automobile or motorcycle sales or repairs;
Carting, express, moving, or hauling terminal or yard;
Drive-through establishment (any establishment where goods or services are rendered directly to occupants of motor vehicles);
Enameling, plating, or painting (except artist’s studio) as a principal use;
except a temporary surface parking lot permitted pursuant to ยง 901.1 (ee); or
other than as permitted by special exception in the W-0 District in ยง926;

level.heading: SOURCE ยง 4402.4 of the Zoning Regulations, effective May 12, 1958; as amended by:
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 22 DCR 1901 (October 14, 1975); Final Rulemaking published at 24 DCR 5144, 5147 (December 10, 1977); Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 9741-43 (December 8, 2000), incorporating by reference the text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 8335, 8430-31 (October 20, 2000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 3440 (April 2, 2004) ; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 6358 (July 8, 2005); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 8943 (September 14, 2007); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 8976 (September 14, 2007); as amended by Final Rulemaking and Order No. 08-20 published at 56 DCR 2181 (March 13, 2009); as corrected by Errata Notice published at 58 DCR 4314, 4317 (May 20, 2011); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 4236, 4238 (May 4, 2012).
